casebody.data:
The REGENT AT TOWN CENTRE HOMEOWNERS' ASSOCIATION, a Nevada non-profit corporation, Appellant,
v.
OXBOW CONSTRUCTION, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company, Respondent. The Regent at Town Centre Homeowners' Association, a Nevada non-profit corporation, Appellant,
v.
Oxbow Construction, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company, Respondent. No. 69777
No. 70296 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MAY 24, 2018

AFFIRMED IN PART. REVERSED IN PART. REMAND.
